# Calendar Names

**API Collection**

Calendar names used by CFDateFormatter.

## Constants

- **gregorianCalendar**: The name of the calendar currently supported by the [doc://com.apple.corefoundation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFDateFormatterKey/calendarName] property.

## Constants

- **Date Formatter Styles**: Predefined date and time format styles.
- **Date Formatter Property Keys**: Keys used in key-value pairs to discover and specify the value of date formatter properties—used in conjunction with [doc://com.apple.corefoundation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFDateFormatterCopyProperty(_:_:)] and [doc://com.apple.corefoundation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFDateFormatterSetProperty(_:_:_:)].

items.description: The name of the calendar currently supported by the [doc://com.apple.corefoundation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFDateFormatterKey/calendarName] property.
